trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Accessibility.IAccessibleHandler" /> and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) <see langword="IAccessibleHandler" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Accessibility.IAccessibleHandler" /> e todos os seus membros expostos fazem parte de um wrapper gerenciado para a interface <see langword="IAccessibleHandler" /> COM (Component Object Model).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:Accessibility.IAccessibleHandler>, see the documentation for the `IAccessibleHandler::AccessibleObjectFromID` method in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <xref:Accessibility.IAccessibleHandler>, consulte a documentação para o `IAccessibleHandler::AccessibleObjectFromID` método na documentação do Microsoft Active Accessibility na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the handle of a window for which an IAccessible interface pointer is to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o identificador de uma janela para o qual um ponteiro de interface IAccessible deverá ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the address of a pointer variable that receives the address of the object's IAccessible interface.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o endereço de uma variável de ponteiro que recebe o endereço da interface IAccessible do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:Accessibility.IAccessibleHandler" /> and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) <see langword="IAccessibleHandler" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:Accessibility.IAccessibleHandler" /> e todos os seus membros expostos fazem parte de um wrapper gerenciado para a interface <see langword="IAccessibleHandler" /> COM (Component Object Model).

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:Accessibility.IAccessibleHandler.AccessibleObjectFromID%2A>, see the documentation for the `IAccessibleHandler::AccessibleObjectFromID` method in the Microsoft Active Accessibility documentation in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre <xref:Accessibility.IAccessibleHandler.AccessibleObjectFromID%2A>, consulte a documentação para o `IAccessibleHandler::AccessibleObjectFromID` método na documentação do Microsoft Active Accessibility na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
